paper_abstract: A wide variety of treatment options for depressives have been developed by both the conventional and complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) sectors. Using data collected from three online newsgroups as well as in-depth interviews, I analyse how people use information when making or justifying claims, or making decisions, about treatments for depression.
paper_title: I am making my decision on the basis of my experience: Constructing Authoritative Knowledge about Treatments for Depression
